text: Neno Tours & Travel Agency is an outstanding privately-owned tour company based in the Islands of Zanzibar-Tanzania. We provide a high quality, travel and tour service with professional and expertise standards that meet our customer`s expectations they always look for. For those who wish to experience adventurous or a chilled-out holiday of their choice, whether on the beach resorts, historical and cultural days tours, volunteering educational trips in Zanzibar Islands, or adventure wildlife tours, including climbing Mount Kilimanjaro, honeymoon holiday, photographic safaris, cultural tourism, ecotourism, and camping safaris, Safaris around mainland Tanzania you have chosen the right place. Our friendly team of professional tour guides are here to introduce you to these magical Islands and the adventures of the mainland Tanzania. So let us know where you would like to go and it will be our pleasure to help you make it happen. Karibu Sana You are most welcomed.
